# Contributing

## Setup

```bash
git clone https://github.com/shader3d/shader3d.git
cd shader3d
npm install
npm run build
```

## Development

```bash
npm run dev        # Run example app
npm run build      # Build all packages
npm run lint       # Lint code
npm run typecheck  # Type check
```

## Commit Messages

Use [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/):

```
feat(core): add compute shader support
fix(runtime): handle WebGPU context loss
docs: update README
```

## Pull Requests

1. Fork the repo
2. Create a feature branch
3. Make changes with clear commits
4. Open a PR

## License

By contributing, you agree your contributions are licensed under the project license.
